entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 11:30AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Jackson, east central Marshall and northern DeKalb Counties through 1215 PM CST... Movement was east at 30 mph.
